Token.Abstract: World gravity defines the gravity of all entities in the world. OGWKinematicsAspect considers the world gravity. Other aspects may use it as they see fit.
Gravity, a negative Y value means downward oriented gravity. Setting gravity will inform all OGWWorldGravityDelegate objects registered on the notifier about the change.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The current gravity vector, in units per step. Defaults to 0,0.
